Articles.Content:
ever since 1.0 my time warp menu will not behave.   it always autohides after about 1 second, even WHILE the mouse is hovered over it.

 

I never liked that it hid in the first place, i want to see it.  is there some hidden setting i cant find to force it to stop hiding?

Don't have this problem.  A couple of remote possibilities occur.  Maybe some file is borked somewhere in your KSP folder (it would have to be one that hasn't changed with the new versions though) easiest way to test that (if you have good internet) would be to reinstall KSP (or install a second instance of it) to see if it makes a difference (first if you're using steam you could try the 'verify integrity of game cache' thing). 

Or maybe some problem with your mouse driver or its settings; Windows (if you use it) has some things that might interefer like some of the mouse pointer setting (e.g. mouse trails I've seen do some strange things in games).

Just wild guesses though, maybe someone else has this problem too.  One question: does it do this in both full screen and windowed mode?

It is a bit finicky moving over the time display just slightly and poof it's gone, but nothing like you describe.  And when in use mine stays on with its nice color coding.
